summary: Crypto VC Samantha Bohbot compares Europe's crypto landscape to the United States'.
title: Here's how Europe's crypto landscape is more robust than the U.S. sector
content: Episode 32 of Season 5 of The Scoop was recorded with The Block's Frank Chaparro and RockawayX Chief Growth Officer and Investor Samantha Bohbot.
Listen below, and subscribe to The Scoop on Apple, Spotify, Google Podcasts, Stitcher, or wherever you listen to podcasts. Feedback and revision requests can be sent to [email protected].
Samantha Bohbot is the Chief Growth Officer and investor at RockawayX — a web3 VC firm headquartered in London, Zurich, and Prague.

In this episode, Bohbot breaks down RockawayX's recent report on the state of crypto funding in Europe, and explains why there are "more VC-baked crypto startups in Europe than in any other geography."
